rules.description: MS Remote Desktop - Left cmd to Left ctrl
rules.title: MS Remote Desktop

manipulators.description: caps + left_control + h for moving to right tab
caps + left_control + l for moving to left tab
caps + left_control + k for closing tabs

rules.description: (Vim 1/11) caps_lock -> on, caps_lock, esc, control+[ or any pointing_button -> off
